instruction: Patient reports missing one dose of warfarin last week; experienced no change in how they felt. Daughter noticed and helped patient resume medication promptly. Patient now using a weekly pill box but sometimes forgets to check it.

attributes.narrative: Missed one dose of warfarin last week and felt no change; daughter noticed the lapse and helped resume the medication promptly. Patient now uses a weekly pill box but sometimes forgets to check it.

instruction: Advise patient to continue using the weekly pill organizer and set up phone alerts (with daughter’s assistance) as a secondary reminder to take anticoagulation medication consistently.

coding.display: Education about use of pill box

attributes.comment: Continue using the weekly pill organizer and set up phone alerts with the daughter’s assistance as a secondary reminder to take anticoagulation medication consistently.
